translations: 投资；投入（时间或精力）；赋予，授予；<旧>给……穿衣；<旧>包围，围攻

phrs.translation: v. 投资于；[口]买进；寄希望于

sentences.sentence: It would be hazardous to invest so much.
Many people don't like to invest in stocks.
sentences.translation: 许多人不喜欢投资股票。

sentences.sentence: They had the foresight to invest in new technology.
sentences.translation: 他们有投资新技术的先见之明。
